blocks.name: ivthALT
blocks.content: An alternate proof of the Intermediate Value Theorem ~ ivth using topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 17-Aug-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
